Index.title: Next 15 Template with i18n and Shadcn UI
Index.description: A powerful starting point for your next multilingual, accessible web application.
Index.OmitRTLInstruction: To use OmitRTL, simply wrap the component you want to omit RTL support for with the OmitRTL component.

Metadata.title: Next.js 15 i18n Template - Multilingual Starter with TypeScript & Tailwind
Metadata.description: Professional Next.js 15 internationalization starter template with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui. Features Arabic RTL support, 5 languages, and modern web development best practices for multilingual applications.
Metadata.keywords: Next.js 15, internationalization, i18n, multilingual, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, Arabic RTL, React, Next.js template, starter kit, web development, SEO optimized, modern UI, responsive design
